resources.string: WeatherXM would like to know your location while using the app. This information will be used to provide more accurate information to you.
Go to the app settings to give the required permissions.
Login with your email and your password to access your account.
The amount of daily weather data generated by stations. One station generates one weather-station-day if it provides high quality data throughout the day.
Station owners are rewarded in $WXM for providing data to the WeatherXM Network.
The number of weather stations manufactured and registered on the network.
The number of weather stations already claimed by users.
The number of weather stations that were active on the network last day.
The average amount of tokens rewarded to a weather station during a month.
Deployed on Testnet - Read more here
Try searching for something else or check for spelling mistakes.
Search for station name or address. Most recent results appear here.
The search query must be at least 2 characters long.
Claim your WXM device by clicking the + button.
Oh, no! No WXM devices yet?
All displayed times are in %s timezone.
We\’re unable to show updated station data. Please make sure your station is operational and connected to the internet.
We\’re unable to show live station data. Please check back later for further updates.
In order for your station to keep operating normally and receive $WXM rewards, you must update your station.

Update download in progress.
Do not switch off the Application!
Make sure you don\'t move away from your station as you might lose Bluetooth connection!
We couldn\’t reach your station. Please make sure the station is powered up, and you are close enough for the Bluetooth connection to work.
In order to be able to update your station, you must first pair it via Bluetooth. To do so, please follow the instructions below.
Your station is updated to the latest Firmware!

Updating failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support@weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution.

There is a brand new firmware update for your station.
We highly recommend you update, as this will improve the experience you’ll have with your WeatherXM station!
We highly recommend you update, as this will improve the experience you’ll have with your WeatherXM station!

A new update of this app has been released. Please click the button below to go to Play Store and update the app.

After updating please restart the app.
If your e-mail is registered with us you will receive instructions for resetting your password.
Enter the email associated with your WeatherXM account and we will send you a password reset link.
By deleting your account, you will no longer be eligible to gain $WXM rewards, and, you will no longer be able to view your station data in the WeatherXM apps.

This will delete the following data:
• Your name.
• Your email address.
• Your station(s) details, their location, and their token rewards history

This will not delete:
• The weather data you’ve shared with the network.
• The $WXM rewards you’ve collected. These are yours forever!
We do not collect nor store any personal data!
If you have any questions regarding your data and the deletion of your account, please contact our support team at support@weatherxm.com.
I understand what deleting my WeatherXM account means.

We hate to see you go, and would like to hear why this happened.\n\nWe’d appreciate it if you could share your feedback with us! It will only take 5 minutes and will help us understand what went wrong!

Deletion failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support@weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution.
You haven\’t added a wallet yet. Thus, we will not be able to send you any $WXM rewards.
It is highly recommended to use MetaMask, as it is the most compatible wallet.
Not sure if you own a $WXM compatible wallet? If your wallet is not compatible you may not be able to redeem or use $WXM rewards!
I acknowledge that I have ownership and full access to this wallet.
I have read and accept the Terms of Service.
Please make sure you have the complete ownership of the Wallet ending in %1$s.\n\nIf you don\’t, you will lose all $WXM rewards from now on!

In order to edit the Wallet Address you need to confirm you are the owner of this account.
Please type in your password to edit Wallet Address.
IMPORTANT: During beta phase, $WXM token is deployed on testnet. Rewards will be recalculated and rewarded again after $WXM mainnet token launch.
Signup with your email and your account will be created shortly.
Thanks for joining WeatherXM! We have sent you an account activation link to %s. Please, set a password and then try to login.
Not receiving an activation email? Contact our support team.

IMPORTANT: During beta phase, $WXM token is deployed on testnet. Rewards will be recalculated and rewarded again after $WXM mainnet token launch. Actual rewards may differ from the ones you see in the chart above.
We will need to access Bluetooth in order to utilise it in connecting and communicating to your WeatherXM Device.
We will need to access your location in order to utilise it in connecting and communicating to your WeatherXM Device.
Select your device from the list below.
Go to Settings and Grant Access
In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Location. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station.
In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs an enabled Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station.
In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station.
We could not find any WeatherXM devices, please try to scan again!

Device\'s serial number can be found in the M5 (shown after automatic reboot, or in the settings screen - swipe right to view). You can also find this information on the box of your station.

It is 18 characters long and looks like this: 12:34:56:78:9A:BC:DE:F0:12. Please type only the letters and numbers.
Not yet, will install at a later time!

Need help with proper weather station installation?
View our installation guide

Your device will be claimed, but until you properly install it, it will not get any $WXM rewards.\n\nOnce you do so, you can enable your device by switching the toggle to “Installed and ready!” on your device details screen.
I hereby acknowledge that the location above is the correct one, and can be used to verify the eligibility of this station\’s rewards.
Sit tight, we’re pairing your account with your WeatherXM device! <b>This process could take up to 2 minutes due to the Helium\'s network bandwidth limitations!<b>

Your station is claimed under your account:
%s

Something went wrong with the connection. Make sure you are near your weather station and retry claiming. If connection still fails, please unpair the station and restart the claiming process. For more details check our troubleshooting guide.

Alternatively, you can contact our support.
Open your phone\'s WiFi manager, and connect to the “WXM M5 XXX” network (this is your M5 device).
After connecting to the M5, open your browser, and type 10.10.1.1 to view the available networks page.
Choose the WiFi network you’d like to connect your M5 to and transmit data.
If you\’re having difficulty completing this step, make sure you watch the instructional video below!
Dev EUI and Device Key can be found in the station package. Alternative, you can scan the QR on the packaging.
Push the RESET button on the bottom of your WeatherXM device to enable Bluetooth pairing. This will expire in 5 minutes. After that, you will need to push it again to restart the pairing!
Tap the \"I\'ve Reset My Device\" button below.
The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support.
Fetching device\'s info failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support.
The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable it and try again.
Connecting to WS2000 has failed. Connection Rejected. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support.
Rebooting WS2000 has failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support.
Given the location of installation you defined in the previous step, we\’ve selected the appropriate frequency for %s.

Helium\'s LoRaWAN Network requires that you set your station\’s frequency for gateway configuration for the country you\’ve installed your station.

A list of the countries and their respective frequencies can be found here.
I hereby acknowledge that the frequency selected above is the correct on for the country \’ve installed and will operate this station.
Setting device\'s frequency failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution.
Oops! No forecast weather data could not be found.
No weather data found for your device for this day.
No weather data found for your device for %s.
This friendly name is private. It will be visible only to you when you are logged in.
You can always update your preferences in the app settings.

To improve user experience in our apps, we are using analytics, for collecting crashes and other anonymous in-app events.
We do not collect ANY identifying information. Everything we collect will be used internally to improve your experience with WeatherXM. All data are anonymized!

Change the frequency this station operates. To do this, make sure you’re close to your station, and that you’ve selected the appropriate frequency for your country.

A list of the countries and their respective frequencies can be found here.

You must set your M5’s frequency to be the same as your station’s in order to receive and transmit data.

Setting the wrong frequency will result in loss of communication with your station, and will affect your $WXM rewards!

This action will enable other devices to pair via bluetooth with the Station. Up to 7 devices can be paired with this station.\n\nUsing a previously paired device, get in proximity to your station, and tap the button below.

Unclaim and remove this station from your account. You will not lose any rewards, but you will not be able to view its data and earn additional $WXM from it.
Learn more about it here.

In order to remove your station you need to confirm you are the owner of this account.
Please type in your password to remove your station.

We’ve detected that your station’s battery level is Low.
Please, replace the batteries as soon as possible, as this may affect your $WXM rewards and data.
Your station is rebooted.\nYou now have a 5 minutes window to pair the station with another device! Station can be paired with up to 7 devices.

Station reboot failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support@weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution.
Given the location of your station, we\’ve selected the appropriate frequency for %s.
Your station’s frequency changed and it’s now %s.

Station frequency change failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support@weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution.
The station is offline. Check that it has batteries and internet connection. If the problem persists, contact our support team at support@weatherxm.com
You cannot add this widget if you do not have a WXM device.
You cannot add this widget if you are not logged in. Please login and try again.
In order to see WeatherXM data, you need to be signed in.
